Question: Who can submit the Mark Visit.
Answers: 1.Mark visit can be submit by any application user from FR to HO.

Question: Can we submit the Mark visit for Non-Registered customers
Answers: 1. Yes, user can submit the Mark visit details for Non-Registered customers by using option Non-Registered customer mark Visit

Question: What is mean by Failure Mark Visit
Answers: 1. If difference identified by application in between customer latitude/Longitude and Visitor latitude Longitude then same visit will be considered as failure mark visit

Question: Where can find the Mark visit details
Answers: 1.On rewards portal user can login and download the mark visit summary by using below Path : MIS Report >> Mark Visit >> Consolidated Mark Visit Summary

Question: What is minimum condition for mark visit
Answers: 1.Customer should be Geo Verify for Mark Visit

Question: How the Mark Visit module work
Answers: 1. Mark visit can be done by any application user.
2. FR/BP/AM/ZM - can do the mark visit to any customer belongs to their zone
3. NSM - can do the mark visit to any customer belongs to their Region
4. HO user can do the mark visit to any customer of all region
